text: Christopher Rithe (1531–1606) was MP for Petersfield from October 1555 to 1559. A lawyer, he was from Northington."The House of Commons, 1509–1558, Volume 1" Bindoff, S.T. p200: London; Secker & Warburg; 1982 ==References== Category:1531 births Category:1606 deaths Category:People from Hampshire Category:16th-century English people Category:17th-century English people Category:English MPs 1555
title: Christopher Rithe
